translations: v．凝视，仔细看：尤指因视力不佳或光线不足而费力地看。
· She peered into the darkness, trying to see who was there.
她凝视着黑暗，试图看清楚谁在那里。

sentences.sentence: He peered closely at the photograph.
sentences.translation: 他聚精会神地端详着相片。

sentences.sentence: He peered at the label on the bottle.
sentences.translation: 他注视着瓶子上的标签。
